title: Sɛnea Nnomaa Guan Awɔ Ne Wim a

lines: Sɛnea nnomaa guan awɔ ne wim a
Ayɛ tumm kɔ wɔn ahotɔ fie no,
Sa'ra na me kra hwehwɛ W'anim dom,
Nya ɔhome ne asomdwoe Wo mu.
Yegyaw yɛn haw mu ko ny'naa W'asɔr'fie,
Yɛnkae huammmɔdi, nusu, ne yaw bio,
Na yɛsɔre te Wo Honhom no nka.
Hy'ra wɔn a 'nadwo yi wɔwɔ yaw mu;
Wɔn a wɔso nnesoa, wɔatɔ beraw
Na boa wɔn a 'hiade hyɛ wɔn so no.
Homeda dɛw, bɛhyɛ koma ny'naa ma;
Na ma asomdwoe pa ntra yɛn afim;
Ma 'yeyi nnwom nhyɛ koma biara ma
Na wɔmfa wɔn ho nhyɛ Nyame dɔ mu.
